attributes.action: A-level and GCSE exams must go on for 2021 to avoid injustice to students
attributes.additional_details: There are thousands of students who waited throughout their life to perform and to prove their ability. A-level and GCSE results stay with them throughout their life to show their ability, to get admission in the university of their choice and professional life. All research about inaccurate predicted grades and last year's results confirm injustice to thousands of students. This should not be repeated in any circumstances.
attributes.background: A-level and GCSE exams for 2021 must go on and should not be cancelled in any circumstances

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554219
